mapper.sql: id, project_name, organization_code, vcs_id, http_url,ssh_url, app_cluster_id, lock_status,is_boot, remark, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by
p.id, p.project_name, p.organization_code, p.vcs_id, p.http_url,p.ssh_url, p.app_cluster_id, p.lock_status,p.is_boot, p.remark, p.del_flag, p.create_date, p.create_by, p.update_date, p.update_by

v.id as "v.id",v.name as "v.name",v.provider_kind as "v.provider_kind", v.auth_type as "v.auth_type", v.base_uri as "v.base_uri", v.ssh_key_pub as "v.ssh_key_pub", v.ssh_key as "v.ssh_key", v.access_token as "v.access_token", v.username as "v.username", v.password as "v.password", v.remark as "v.remark", v.enable as "v.enable", v.del_flag as "v.del_flag", v.create_date as "v.create_date", v.create_by as "v.create_by", v.update_date as "v.update_date", v.update_by as "v.update_by"
mapper.select:
select ,
from ci_project p left join ci_vcs v on v.id = p.vcs_id where p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update ci_project
vcs_id = #{vcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
http_url = #{httpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ssh_url = #{sshUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_boot = #{isBoot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ci_project set vcs_id = #{vcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, http_url = #{httpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssh_url = #{sshUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_boot = #{isBoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ,
,g.name as group_name from ci_project p left join erm_app_cluster g on p.app_cluster_id=g.id left join ci_vcs v on v.id=p.vcs_id where p.del_flag!=1
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${groupName}','%')
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${projectName}','%')
AND p.is_boot = #{isBoot,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ,
from ci_project p left join ci_vcs v on v.id=p.vcs_id where p.del_flag!=1 and p.project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ,
from ci_project p left join ci_vcs v on v.id=p.vcs_id where p.app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.del_flag!=1 limit 1
